mapper.select: select a.id, case when ISNULL(a.account_date) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.account_date,'%Y-%m-%d') end as account_date, a.materials_code, a.materials_name, a.out_num, a.theoretical_yield, a.dry_out_num, a.dry_theoretical_yield, a.wet_out_num, a.wet_theoretical_yield, a.throw_state, a.create_user_id, a.create_user_name, case when ISNULL(a.create_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end as create_time, a.modify_user_id, a.modify_user_name, case when ISNULL(a.modify_time) then '' else DATE_FORMAT(a.modify_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') end as modify_time from product_oi_coke_ovens a where 1=1 and (#{condition.startDate} = '' or a.account_date >= case when #{condition.startDate} = '' then null else #{condition.startDate} end) and (#{condition.endDate} = '' or a.account_date <= case when #{condition.endDate} = '' then null else #{condition.endDate} end) and (#{condition.materialsCode} = '' or a.materials_code like concat('%',#{condition.materialsCode},'%')) order by ${condition.order} ${condition.orderby}
select mt FROM `v_quality_ts_record` WHERE coalType = 'F' and send_date = curdate() ORDER BY send_time DESC limit 1

select a.materials_code as coke_materials_code, case when b.materials_code is not null then b.materials_code when d.materials_code is not null then d.materials_code else '' end as coal_materials_code, case when b.proportion is not null then round(sum(a.single_hole_production * c.single_consumption * b.proportion * 0.01),0) when d.proportion is not null then round(sum(a.single_hole_production * c.single_consumption * d.proportion * 0.01),0) else 0 end as qty from product_oi_output_performance_manual_bake a INNER JOIN ( select b.materials_code,a.quenching_method,a.single_consumption from product_oi_information_configuration a INNER JOIN materials_mr_code b ON a.materials_code = b.id ) c ON a.materials_code = c.materials_code and a.coke_type = c.quenching_method, ( select a.materials_code,a.materials_name,case when a.coal_tower_weight = 0 then 0 else a.material_weight / a.coal_tower_weight * 100 end as proportion from ( select a.material_code as materials_code,a.material_name as materials_name,c.coal_tower_weight,sum(a.material_weight) as material_weight from product_oi_configure_coal_species_performance_detail a INNER JOIN product_oi_configure_coal_species_performance c ON a.main_id = c.id INNER JOIN ( select max(start_time) as start_time from product_oi_configure_coal_species_performance a, (select convert(dict_value,SIGNED) as dict_value from sys_dict_data where dict_label='倒推时间') as b where a.start_time >= concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_add(date_add(now(),interval -1 day), interval -1 * b.dict_value hour),'%Y-%m-%d'),' 20:00:00') and a.start_time < concat(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),' 20:00:00') ) as b ON c.start_time = b.start_time group by a.material_code,a.material_name,c.coal_tower_weight ) as a ) b, ( select b.materials_code,b.materials_name,a.proportion from product_oi_plan_config_coke_detail a INNER JOIN materials_mr_code b ON a.coal_type_id = b.id INNER JOIN ( select a.id from product_oi_plan_config_coke a INNER JOIN ( select max(plan_start_time) as plan_start_time from product_oi_plan_config_coke a, (select convert(dict_value,SIGNED) as dict_value from sys_dict_data where dict_label='倒推时间') as b where a.plan_start_time >= concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_add(date_add(now(),interval -1 day), interval -1 * b.dict_value hour),'%Y-%m-%d'),' 20:00:00') and a.plan_start_time < concat(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),' 20:00:00') ) as b ON a.plan_start_time = b.plan_start_time ) c ON a.plan_id = c.id ) d where concat(DATE_FORMAT(production_date,'%Y-%m-%d'),' ',DATE_FORMAT(actual_production_time,'%H:%i:%s')) >= concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_add(now(), interval -1 day),'%Y-%m-%d'),' 20:00:00') and concat(DATE_FORMAT(production_date,'%Y-%m-%d'),' ',DATE_FORMAT(actual_production_time,'%H:%i:%s')) < concat(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),' 20:00:00') group by a.materials_code,b.materials_code,b.proportion,d.materials_code,d.proportion

select * from ( select concat(DATE_FORMAT(a.account_date,'%Y%m%d'),'2000') as castDate, planStoveNumber, realStoveNumber, totalCoOutputA, totalCoOutputB, totalCoOutputC, dryStoveNumberA, moistStoveNumberA, dryStoveNumberB, moistStoveNumberB, dryStoveNumberC, moistStoveNumberC, ifnull(nutCoOutput, 0) as nutCoOutput, ifnull(coFinesOutput,0) as coFinesOutput, totalCoOutputA - case when (totalCoOutputA + totalCoOutputB + totalCoOutputC) = 0 then 0 else (totalCoOutputA / (totalCoOutputA + totalCoOutputB + totalCoOutputC)) * (ifnull(nutCoOutput, 0) + ifnull(coFinesOutput,0)) end as ferroCoOutputA, totalCoOutputB - case when (totalCoOutputA + totalCoOutputB + totalCoOutputC) = 0 then 0 else (totalCoOutputB / (totalCoOutputA + totalCoOutputB + totalCoOutputC)) * (ifnull(nutCoOutput, 0) + ifnull(coFinesOutput,0)) end as ferroCoOutputB, totalCoOutputC - case when (totalCoOutputA + totalCoOutputB + totalCoOutputC) = 0 then 0 else (totalCoOutputC / (totalCoOutputA + totalCoOutputB + totalCoOutputC)) * (ifnull(nutCoOutput, 0) + ifnull(coFinesOutput,0)) end as ferroCoOutputC from ( select DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') as account_date, count(single_hole_production) as planStoveNumber, count(single_hole_production) as realStoveNumber, sum(case when materials_code = '0150104' then single_hole_production else 0 end) as totalCoOutputA, sum(case when materials_code = '0150105' then single_hole_production else 0 end) as totalCoOutputB, sum(case when materials_code = '0150106' then single_hole_production else 0 end) as totalCoOutputC, sum(case when materials_code = '0150104' and coke_type = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as dryStoveNumberA, sum(case when materials_code = '0150104' and coke_type = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as moistStoveNumberA, sum(case when materials_code = '0150105' and coke_type = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as dryStoveNumberB, sum(case when materials_code = '0150105' and coke_type = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as moistStoveNumberB, sum(case when materials_code = '0150106' and coke_type = 1 then 1 else 0 end) as dryStoveNumberC, sum(case when materials_code = '0150106' and coke_type = 2 then 1 else 0 end) as moistStoveNumberC from product_oi_output_performance_manual_bake where concat(DATE_FORMAT(production_date,'%Y-%m-%d'),' ',DATE_FORMAT(actual_production_time,'%H:%i:%s')) >= concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_add(now(), interval -1 day),'%Y-%m-%d'),' 20:00:00') and concat(DATE_FORMAT(production_date,'%Y-%m-%d'),' ',DATE_FORMAT(actual_production_time,'%H:%i:%s')) <= concat(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),' 20:00:00') ) as a LEFT JOIN ( select DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') as account_date, sum(production_performance_jd) as nutCoOutput, sum(production_performance_jf) as coFinesOutput from ( select sum(ifnull(a.complete_pound_num,0)) as production_performance_jd, 0 as production_performance_jf from logistics_wv_trans_actual_nut a where a.car_send_date >= concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_add(now(), interval -1 day),'%Y-%m-%d'),' 20:00:00') and a.car_send_date <= concat(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),' 20:00:00') union all select 0 as production_performance_jd, sum(ifnull(a.complete_pound_num,0)) as production_performance_jf from logistics_wv_trans_actual_fines a where a.car_send_date >= concat(DATE_FORMAT(date_add(now(), interval -1 day),'%Y-%m-%d'),' 20:00:00') and a.car_send_date <= concat(DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d'),' 20:00:00') ) as a ) b ON a.account_date = b.account_date ) as a, ( select sum(case when materials_id = '0150104' then inventory else 0 end) as totalCoStoreA, sum(case when materials_id = '0150104' then inventory else 0 end) as ferroCoStoreA, sum(case when materials_id = '0150105' then inventory else 0 end) as totalCoStoreB, sum(case when materials_id = '0150105' then inventory else 0 end) as ferroCoStoreB, sum(case when materials_id = '0150106' then inventory else 0 end) as totalCoStoreC, sum(case when materials_id = '0150106' then inventory else 0 end) as ferroCoStoreC, sum(case when materials_id = '0150301' then inventory else 0 end) as nutCoStore, sum(case when materials_id = '0150201' then inventory else 0 end) as coFinesStore, 0 as waterCoFinesStore, 0 as sulgaoStore from materials_mr_coke_stock ) as b
